title: Character Stuttering all over the place
body:
So this only just happened today, as far as I can tell. Someone I played with said they were experiencing the same thing, my character seems to be stuttering when I move or change direction. My ping is at a constant 97, which is it's usual amount. This has never happened to me before, not even when I lag. I can only assume there is an in-game issue happening atm or somehow one of my settings changed. I'm curious to know if anyone has a solution to this, or if it's an actual problem in-game that needs to be fixed.

Thanks

replies.body: I turned character movement prediction off and it seems to have stopped, neat.
Glad to hear you got it fixed on your end ^_^!
